function reformatInt(i)
  return tostring(i):reverse():gsub("%d%d%d", "%1 "):reverse():gsub("^,", "")
end

function isOre(name)
     if name == "Bauxite" or
        name == "Coal" or
        name == "Quartz" or
        name == "Hematite" or
        name == "Natron" or
        name == "Chromite" or
        name == "Limestone" or
        name == "Malachite" or
        name == "Garnierite" or

        ore == "Coal" then return Coal elseif
        ore == "Quartz" then return Quartz elseif
        ore == "Hematite" then return Hematite elseif

     end
end

function Split(s, delimiter)
    result = {};
    for match in (s..delimiter):gmatch("(.-)"..delimiter) do
        table.insert(result, match);
    end
    return result;
end
